description.lang: Simon Electronic Switch IO integrated by Electronic Switch that provides power Switch and Rocker that provides Z-Wave communication attributes.

On/Off Report when load state is changed:- On -> CC Basic, Basic Report, Value 0xFF- Off -> CC Basic, Basic Report, Value 0x00Instant Power Consumption vary over 10% and is stable almost 2sec- CC Meter, Meter Report, Electric meter, Consumed, Watts, Size 4, Precision 1, Value (W)Calibration requirement change. (If device needs to be calibrated and is Added into a Z-Wave network, it will report after receive an Association Set of life line).- Calibration required -> CC Configuration, Configuration Report, Param 23, Value 0xFF- Calibration not required -> CC Configuration, Configuration Report, Param 23, Value 0x00After reset the Z-Wave module, a DEVICE-RESET-LOCALLY-NOTIFICATION is sent.Report
Ctrl On/Off Report when load state is changed:- On -> CC Basic, Basic Report, Value 0xFF- Off -> CC Basic, Basic Report, Value 0x00
Allows to turn ON or OFF the central LED
Turns the LED OFF
Turns the LED ON
Sets the delay time to turn on the light
Disables timing
1 second (0x01) to 127 seconds (0x7F) in 1 second resolution
1 minute (0x80) to 127 minutes (0xFE) in 1 minute resolution
Sets the time the light stays on
Disables timing
1 second (0x01) to 127 seconds (0x7F) in 1 second resolution
1 minute (0x80) to 127 minutes (0xFE) in 1 minute resolution
Sets the central led ilumination when the key is in repose state
LED OFF
LED on at 20 percent of maximum level
Locks or Unlocks the direct control of the load
Unlock the direct control of load
Lock the direct control of load
Resets groups, Z-Wave status, and some or all configurations depending on the configuration value (write only)
Parameters, Groups, and Z-Wave status are restored to default value.
Parameters, except Lock long press are restored to default
Sets the delay time to turn off the light
Disables timing
1 second (0x01) to 127 seconds (0x7F) in 1 second resolution
1 minute (0x80) to 127 minutes (0xFE) in 1 minute resolution
Controls the behavior of the product when the key is pressed
When short press, device toggles the load
When short press, device turns ON the load
When short press, device turns OFF the load

When short press, device turns ON the load. When hold press from 2 seconds to 10 seconds device turns OFF the load. The Slider does not works.With this configuration, the device will not send the Node Info neither Show the LEDs feedback with this press action
Allows to identify a product using its central LED (write only)
the central LED blinks for 5 seconds in order to identify the device
Reports the state of the charge (read only)
Load is OFF
Load is ON
Load is OFF
Load is ON
Reports if calibration is required or not (read only)
Calibration is not required
It is necessary to calibrate the dimmer to work properly
Locks or unlocks the long press on the key
Long press works as described previously
Long press from 2 seconds to 20 seconds does not send a Node info. With a long press above 30 seconds, all parameters except Lock long press
Performs a device calibration
Device performs calibration using Trailing and leading Edge and decides which one is better
Device is calibrated using Trailing Edge.
Device is calibrated using Leading Edge
